queriesFeature.query: project ='ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) ORDER BY priority
project = 'HCSINT' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит уточнения')  AND issuetype in (Question) ORDER BY priority
project = 'HCSINT' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит уточнения')  AND issuetype in (Question) AND status not in (Закрыт, Отменена, Closed) ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Blocker ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Critical ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Major ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Minor ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Trivial ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Blocker ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Major ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Critical ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Minor ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority = Trivial ORDER BY priority

project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) AND issuetype in (Bug) AND priority in (Critical, Blocker) ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%Feature%, 'содержит дефекты')  AND status = Заблокирован AND issuetype in (Bug) ORDER BY priority

queriesVersion.query: project = HCS AND type = Task AND status not in (Отменен, Отменена) AND fixVersion = '%Version%' AND fixVersion != 'Вне версии' AND component not in (Tech_Task, Bug_Task, Test_Task) ORDER BY status ASC
project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion = '%Version%' AND status !=Отменен ORDER BY priority DESC
project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion = '%Version%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND status !=Отменен ORDER BY priority DESC
project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion = '%Version%' AND status not in (Отменен) AND status='Закрыт' ORDER BY priority DESC

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND status in (Closed, Закрыт) AND affectedVersion = '%Version%' AND fixversion = '%Version%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) ORDER BY priority DESC
project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND status not in (Отменен) AND affectedVersion = '%Version%' AND fixversion > '%Version%'  ORDER BY priority DESC

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND status not in (Отменен) AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND affectedVersion = '%Version%' AND fixversion > '%Version%' ORDER BY priority DESC
project = project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion = '%Version%' AND status not in (Отменен) AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт) AND fixversion = '%Version%' ORDER BY priority DESC

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion= '%Version%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND status !=Отменен AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт)  AND fixversion = '%Version%' ORDER BY priority DESC

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion= '%Version%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен)  AND fixversion = '%Version%'

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion = '%Version%' AND fixVersion >= '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND Наведенный = Наведен ORDER BY affectedVersion ASC, priority DESC

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND fixVersion = '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен)  and (affectedVersion < '%Version%' Or (affectedVersion = '%Version%'  And Наведенный = 'Не наведен')) ORDER BY affectedVersion ASC, priority DESC

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND fixVersion = '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Trivial

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND fixVersion = '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Minor

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND fixVersion = '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Major

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND fixVersion = '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Critical

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND fixVersion = '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Blocker

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND fixVersion != '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Trivial

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND fixVersion != '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Minor

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND fixVersion != '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Major

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Major

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Critical

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND affectedVersion='%prevVersion%' AND Наведенный in (Наведен, 'Не известно', 'Не проверялось', Подтверждаю, EMPTY) AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен) AND priority = Blocker

project = HCS AND issuetype in (Bug) AND fixVersion = '%Version%' AND status not in (Closed, Закрыт, Отменен)  and (affectedVersion < '%Version%' Or (affectedVersion = '%Version%'  And Наведенный = 'Не наведен')) AND priority = Trivial
